member.summary: Initializes a new FormProcessingEngine class object.

member.summary: Loads field data from the specified stream.
member.param: A System.IO.Stream containing the field data to be loaded.

member.summary: Loads field data from the specified file.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.FormProcessingEngine.Process(Leadtools.RasterImage,Leadtools.Forms.Processing.FormProcessingOptions)
member.summary: Performs field processing on the form image using the specified options.
member.param: The form image.
Processing options. Must not be **null**.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.FormProcessingEngine.Process(Leadtools.RasterImage,Leadtools.Forms.Common.PageAlignment)
member.summary: Performs field processing on the form image.
member.param: Form image.
A value that indicates the Form Alignment. It aligns the Master Form's fields to this form field. If it is null the fields will be aligned depending on the image resolution.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.FormProcessingEngine.Process(Leadtools.RasterImage,System.Int32,System.Int32,Leadtools.Forms.Common.PageAlignment)
member.summary: Performs field processing on the form image.
member.param: The Leadtools.RasterImage.
First form page to process. It is a 1-based value.
Last form page to process. It is a 1-based value.

A value that indicates the Form Alignment. Alignment matches a LeadRect that represents a specific area in the Master Form to its equivalent area in the Form. If it is null the fields will be aligned depending on the image resolution.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.FormProcessingEngine.ProcessPage(Leadtools.RasterImage,System.Int32,Leadtools.Forms.Processing.PageProcessingOptions)
member.summary: Performs field processing with options on the page image provided.
member.param: Page image. Must not be **null**.
1-based index, indicates the Master Form page number that corrospondslast to the provided form page.
Options to use. Can be **null**.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.FormProcessingEngine.ProcessPage(Leadtools.RasterImage,Leadtools.Forms.Common.PageAlignment,System.Int32)
member.summary: Performs field processing on the page image provided.
member.param: Page image.
A value that indicates the page Alignment. It aligns the Master Form's fields to this page field. If it is null fields will be aligned depending on the image resolution.
1-based index, indicate the Master Form page number that corrospondslast to the provided form page.

member.summary: Specifies which recognition algorithm trade-off setting to use for forms processing.

member.summary: Initialzies a new instance of this class.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.FormProcessingOptions.FirstPageNumber
member.summary: First page number of the form to process.
member.value: 1-based first page number of the form to process. A value of -1 means the first page in the form. Default value is -1.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.FormProcessingOptions.FormAlignment
member.summary: Optional form alignment for each page.
member.value: Array of PageAlignment for each page in the form. Default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.FormProcessingOptions.LastPageNumber
member.summary: Last page number of the form to process.
member.value: 1-based last page number of the form to process. A value of -1 means the last page in the form. Default value is -1.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.FormProcessingOptions.SvgDocuments
member.summary: Optional SVG representation of each page in the form.
member.value: Array of ISvgDocument for each page in the form. Default value is **null**.

member.summary: Initializes a new ProcessFieldEventArgs class object.

member.summary: Initializes a new ProcessFieldEventArgs class object with explicit parameters.
member.param: The page image that is under processing.
The starting page number for the process.
The current page number that is undergoing processing.
The last page number to be processed.
The current field being processed.
The index of the field being processed.
The number of fields in the current page.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.ProcessFieldEventArgs.#ctor(Leadtools.RasterImage,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,Leadtools.Forms.Processing.FormField,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of ProcessFieldEventArgs that is used in ProcessField event.
member.param: The form page image that is undergoing processing.
The first page number of the form to be processed.
The page number of the page that is currently undergoing processing.
The last page number of the form to be processed.
The field currently being processed.
Index of the current field in the page field list.
Number of fields in the current form page.
Indicates whether ProcessField event using this instance of ProcessFieldEventArgs was fired before processing the field or after processing it.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.ProcessFieldEventArgs.Cancel
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag to cancel the current processing.
member.value: true to abort, false to continue normally.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.ProcessFieldEventArgs.Field
member.summary: Gets the field currently being processed.
member.value: The field currently being processed.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.ProcessFieldEventArgs.FieldCount
member.summary: Gets the number of fields in the current form page.
member.value: The number of fields in the current form page.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.ProcessFieldEventArgs.FieldIndex
member.summary: Gets the index of the current field in the page field list.
member.value: The zero-based integer that specifies the position of the current field in the fields list.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.ProcessFieldEventArgs.Form
member.summary: Gets the form page image that is undergoing processing.
member.value: A Leadtools.RasterImage object that represents the form image.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.ProcessFieldEventArgs.FormCurrentPageNumber
member.summary: Gets the page number of the page that is currently undergoing processing.
member.value: The 1-based integer that specifies the page number of the current form.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.ProcessFieldEventArgs.FormFirstPageNumber
member.summary: Gets the first page number of the form to be processed.
member.value: The 1-based integer that specifies the first page number to process.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.ProcessFieldEventArgs.FormLastPageNumber
member.summary: Gets the last page number of the form to be processed.
member.value: The 1-based integer that specifies the page number of the last page to be processed.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.ProcessFieldEventArgs.IsPreprocess
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether ProcessField event using the associated instance of ProcessFieldEventArgs was fired before processing the field or after processing it.
member.value: **true** to indicate the ProcessField event was fired before processing a FormField. Otherwise, **false** to indicate the ProcessField event was fired after processing a FormField.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.ProcessPageEventArgs
member.summary: Handles each page processed by FormProcessingEngine.

member.summary: Initializes a new ProcessPageEventArgs class object.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.ProcessPageEventArgs.#ctor(Leadtools.RasterImage,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean,Leadtools.Ocr.IOcrDocument,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new ProcessPageEventArgs class object with explicit parameters.
member.param: The page image that is under processing.
The start processing page number.
The current page number that is under processing.
The last processing page number.
Specifies if this page needs to be added to the OCR engine to process its fields.
Specifies an OCR Document that is created from the Ocr engine.
Specifies the page index in the \ocrDocument\ if it is already added or -1 if it is not.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.ProcessPageEventArgs.#ctor(Leadtools.RasterImage,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean,Leadtools.Ocr.IOcrDocument,System.Int32,Leadtools.Forms.Processing.FormField,Leadtools.Forms.Common.PageAlignment)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of ProcessPageEventArgs that is used in PreProcessPage and PostProcessPage events.
member.param: The form page image that is being processed.
The starting page number of the form being processed.
The current page number that is undergoing processing.
The last page number of the form being processed.
A flag that specifies whether this page needs to be added to the OCR engine in order to process its fields.
The OcrDocument that contains the page.
The index of the page in the OcrDocument.
A List<FormField> object that contains the fields of this form page.

A Leadtools.Forms.Common.PageAlignment object that determines the amount of shift and scaling to align the Master Form's fields to this page field. If it is **null**, fields will be aligned depending on the image resolution.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.ProcessPageEventArgs.Alignment
member.summary: A Leadtools.Forms.Common.PageAlignment object that determines the amount of shift and scaling to align the Master Form's fields to the fields on the page. If it is null, fields align depending on the image's resolution.
member.value: Leadtools.Forms.Common.PageAlignment object.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.ProcessPageEventArgs.Fields

member.value: A List<FormField> object.

member.summary: Gets the form page image that is being processed.

member.summary: Gets the current page number that is undergoing processing.

member.summary: Gets the starting page number of the form being processed.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.ProcessPageEventArgs.FormLastPageNumber
member.summary: Gets the last page number of the form being processed.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.BubbleWordValueType
member.summary: Enumeration that represents which value type the bubble word field contains. The Character value type can contain any combination of alphanumeric characters. The Numerical value type contains only numerals.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.BubbleWordValueType.Character
member.summary: Any possible values of textual or numerical type.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.BubbleWordValueType.Numerical
member.summary: Values of numerical type only.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.DropoutFlag
member.summary: Values that represent the Dropout options for a form field.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.DropoutFlag.None
member.summary: Do not use the dropout feature.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.DropoutFlag.CellsDropout
member.summary: Drop out the cell borders containing the data, so cell lines will not be detected.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.DropoutFlag.WordsDropout
member.summary: Drop out the words appearing on the master forms in the same field area.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.FieldAlignment
member.summary: Values that represent the alignment of columns/fields in a table.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.FieldAlignment.Left
member.summary: Left alignment.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.FieldAlignment.Center
member.summary: Center alignment.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.FieldAlignment.Right
member.summary: Right alignment.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.FormFieldSerializationTagType
member.summary: The serialization type to use with form fields.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.FormFieldSerializationTagType.String
member.summary: Serialize the form field as a string. Using this mode ensures that the forms data files can be used by both the .NET framework and .NET standard version of LEADTOOLS.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.FormFieldSerializationTagType.Binary
member.summary: Use binary serialization. Using this mode will prevent forms data files created by the .NET framework version of LEADTOOLS from being used by the .NET standard version. This value is not supported and will throw an exception when used through the .NET standard version of LEADTOOLS.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.FormFieldStatus
member.summary: Values that describe the status of field processing.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.FormFieldStatus.Success
member.summary: Success.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.FormFieldStatus.Failed
member.summary: Failure.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.OcrTextType
member.summary: Values that indicate the different text field types.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.OcrTextType.FlowText
member.summary: Flow text type field.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.OcrTextType.Table
member.summary: Table type field.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.OcrTextType.Graphic
member.summary: Field containing graphics.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.OcrTextType.Omr
member.summary: Omr type field.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.OcrTextType.Micr
member.summary: Micr (Magnetic ink character recognition) type field.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.OcrTextType.Icr
member.summary: Icr (hand written) text type field.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.OcrTextType.None
member.summary: None type field.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.SingleSelectionStatus
member.summary: Represents the status of processing the SingleSelectionField.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.SingleSelectionStatus.Error
member.summary: Error processing the field

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.SingleSelectionStatus.Success
member.summary: Successfully processed the field

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.SingleSelectionStatus.NoSelection
member.summary: The field has been successfully processed but with no filled OMR

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.SingleSelectionStatus.MultipleSelections
member.summary: The field has been successfully processed but with multiple filled OMR

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.TableRules
member.summary: Values that represent the rules that will be used to help recognizing Table fields.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.TableRules.NoRules
member.summary: Do not use any rules when recognizing Table fields.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.TableRules.RowsLineSeparator
member.summary: Use horizontal lines to separate each table row from the other rows.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.TableRules.EqualFixedRowHeight
member.summary: Use a fixed row height so that the distance between each row in the table is equal.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.TableRules.EqualFixedLineHeight
member.summary: Use a fixed line height so that the distance between each line in the table is equal.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.TableRules.MultiPageTableHeaderRepeted
member.summary: If a table extends over multiple pages, add a table header containing the column names to each page.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.TextFieldType
member.summary: Values that represent the type of text being used in the Text Field.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.TextFieldType.Character
member.summary: Character field. The field contains alphanumeric characters (both uppercase and lowercase), the Arabic numerals 0 – 9, punctuation marks, and symbols.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.TextFieldType.Numerical
member.summary: Numeric field. The field consists entirely of Arabic numerals.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.TextFieldType.Data
member.summary: Data field. The field is a named zone (field) on a form which can contain capital letters, digits, and separators.
